## StoreLogger type

Store的日志记录器

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StoreLogger = ({ id, isActive }: {
    id: number;
    isActive: boolean;
}, actionName: string, payload: any[], priority: string[], handers: string[], state: {
    [moduleName: string]: any;
}, effect: boolean) => void;
```

## Remarks

Store的所有变化都将调用该记录器
